Xenomai scheduler.

Collaboration diagram for Xenomai scheduler.:

Detailed Description

A scheduler for mimicking real-time operating systems.

Xenomai is an RTAI scheduler which provides generic real-time operating services suited for the implementation of real-time operating system interfaces.


Modules

 Dynamic memory allocation services.
 Interrupt management.
 Nanokernel mutex services.
 Real-time pod services.
 Real-time shadow services.
 Thread synchronization services.
